mainSequence.step: Student takes an exam
UI requests list of unsolved automatic exams
Controller retrieves list of unsolved automatic exams from Service1
Service1 fetches unsolved automatic exams from Repository1
Service1 returns list of unsolved automatic exams to Controller
Controller provides the list of unsolved automatic exams to UI
UI displays the list of automatic exams to the Student
Student selects an automatic exam to take
UI informs Controller about the selected automatic exam
UI requests the exam to be prepared for taking
Controller builds the exam
Service3 processes and prepares the exam
Controller provides the exam to UI
Student starts taking the exam
Student answers the questions in the exam
UI validates each question answered by the Student
Controller calculates the exam grade based on percentage
Service3 computes the exam grade on percentage
Controller receives the grades for the exam
UI displays the grades to the Student
UI prompts the Student to save the grade
Controller saves the grade along with the Student and Automatic Exam details in Repository3
UI provides feedback to the Student
